DataListSpec.Name: Installment Refund Issue Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Used to find constituents who have an installment with a balance that is has a later installment with a payment applied
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_INSTALLMENTREFUNDISSUE(@CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier) as set nocount on;
;with InstallmentHistory ( ID, PARENTID, ACTIVITYTYPE, AMOUNT, BALANCE, INSTALLMENTDATE) as ( select rgi.ID, rgi.REVENUEID as PARENTID, 'Installment', TRANSACTIONAMOUNT, dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT_GETINSTALLMENTBALANCE(rgi.ID), rgi.DATE from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT rgi join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE r_sch on r_sch.ID = rgi.REVENUEID where r_sch.STATUSCODE = 0 ),
MinOpenInstallment (RGID, INSTALLMENTDATE) as ( select PARENTID, MIN(INSTALLMENTDATE) from InstallmentHistory where BALANCE > 0 group by PARENTID ),
MaxIntallmentWithPayment (RGID, INSTALLMENTDATE) as ( select PARENTID, max(INSTALLMENTDATE) from InstallmentHistory where BALANCE < AMOUNT group by PARENTID )
select mininst.RGID as RECURRINGGIFTID, c.ID as CONSTITUENTID, ft.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID as REVENUELOOKUPID, mininst.INSTALLMENTDATE as MININSTALLMENTWITHBALANCE, maxinst.INSTALLMENTDATE as MAXINSTALLMENTWITHPAYMENT, r_sch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, c.LOOKUPID as CONSTITUENTLOOKUPID, c.NAME as CONSTITUENTNAME from MinOpenInstallment mininst join MaxIntallmentWithPayment maxinst on mininst.RGID = maxinst.RGID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = mininst.RGID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE r_sch on r_sch.ID = ft.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on ft.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID
where mininst.InstallmentDate < maxinst.InstallmentDate and r_sch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE < maxinst.InstallmentDate
